name: Make It Rain: Love of Money
description: Make it Rain: The Love of The Money is a swiper game, where you have to invest your money in the best way to get richer then get more richer and then be very very rich. Be a business manager and success in your investments! Or otherwise, die in the process and start again to amass a lot of cash!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: INTEL® CORE™ i3-8130U PROCESSOR Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7800 Series Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8600K Processor Memory: 9 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 / Radeon R7 265 Storage: 2 GB available space
